${ModID}:Sail.NAME: Sail
${ModID}:Sail.FLAVOR: Much like the other parts of the boat, this piece helps you defensively, but much more flexibly so than the other parts.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #ySet #ySail card that gives #b6 #yBlock. After your 3rd turn, #yExhaust it.

${ModID}:Whelp.NAME: Whelp
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #yCurse card, deal #b1 damage to all enemies. Deal #b1 more for every #b100 gold you have.
